marytts.signalproc.analysis
Class Labels

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.analysis.AlignmentData
      marytts.signalproc.analysis.Labels

public class Labels
extends AlignmentData

A collection of EST formatted labels with ascii text file input/output functionality

Author:
Oytun Türk

getLabelIndexAtTime

public int getLabelIndexAtTime(double time)
For the given time, return the index of the label at that time, if any.

Parameters:
time - time in seconds
Returns:
the index of the label at that time, or -1 if there isn't any
